name: Uttarpara Aaradhona Welfare Society

address: 82, Banerjee Para St. , Nirmala Abasan, Uttarpara

briefDescription: UTTARPARA AARADHONA WELFARE SOCIETY is a NGO (non-governmental organization) based in KOLKATA, UTTARPARA, registered under the West Bengal Societies Act 1961 (Registration number S/2L/38829 of 2015-2016) and registered under the 12AA scheme of The Income Tax Act 1961, comprising of professionals (Doctors, Social workers, Educationists). Founded in Kolkata in 2013 by a group of various Persons Aaradhona now offers education from kindergarten to Class 12 (A level equivalent) both to children from our homes and to children from nearby slums who attend as day scholars. Sport and many other activities broaden their horizons and foster their talents. Once they have completed their schooling, Aaradhona helps the young adults to move into higher education, training or paid employment.
